short: One small step for today, one giant leap for the endgame.
Be brave and take risks. Nothing can substitute experience.
No matter how you feel. Get up, dress up, show up and never give up.
Your path is beautiful and crooked and just as it should be.
There are only two options: Make progress or make excuses.
Live less out of habit and more out of intent.
Every day is a new beginning. Take a deep breath and start again.
Your track record for getting through bad days is 100%

short.text: Life is good because I decided to make it that way.
short.author: #Bossbabe

short.text: Admire more. Most people don’t admire enough.
short.author: Van Gogh

short.text: Fear is stupid, so are regrets.
short.author: Marilyn Monroe

short.text: A candle loses none of its light by lighting another.
short.author: Rumi

short.text: You have escaped the cage. Your wings are stretched out. Now fly.
short.author: Rumi

short.text: Attitude is the difference between an ordeal and an adventure.
short.author: Bob Bitchin

long: Growth is painful. Change is painful. But nothing is as painful as staying stuck somewhere you don’t belong.
A secret to happiness is letting every situation be what it is, instead of what you think it should be.
You are good enough, smart enough, beautiful enough, and strong enough. Believe it and never let insecurity run your life.
I will never apologize for who I am. I’ve worked hard to evolve and I’m proud of my triumphs.

It’s a terrible thing, I think, in life to wait until you’re ready. I have this feeling now that actually no one is ever ready to do anything. There is almost no such thing as ready. There is only now.

long.text: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
long.author: Mark Twain

long.text: Knowing is not enough; we must apply. Willing is not enough; we must do.
long.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

long.text: The mind is everything. What you think, you become.
long.author: Gautama Buddha

long.text: For success, attitude is equally as important as ability.
long.author: Walter Scott

long.text: A person often meets his destiny on the road he took to avoid it.
long.author: Jean de La Fontaine

long.text: Positive anything is better than negative nothing.
long.author: Elbert Hubbard

long.text: Don’t judge each day by the harvest that you reap but by the seeds that you plant.
long.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

long.text: A journey of a thousand miles, begins with a single step.
long.author: Laozi

long.text: A good day is a good day, a bad day is a good story. At the end of the day, it’s all good.
long.author: Glennon Melton

long.text: The purpose of this glorious life is not simply to endure it, but to soar, stumble, and flourish as you learn to fall in love with existence. We were born to live my dear not merely exist.
long.author: Becca Lee

long.text: Nothing can stop the man with the right mental attitude from achieving his goal; nothing on earth can help the man with the wrong mental attitude.
long.author: Thomas Jefferson

long.text: It may be hard for an egg to turn into a bird: it would be a jolly sight harder for it to learn to fly while remaining an egg. We are like eggs at present. And you cannot go on indefinitely being just an ordinary decent egg. We must be hatched or go bad.
long.author: C.S. Lewis

long.text: Success is no accident. It is hard work, perseverance, learning, studying, sacrifice, and most of all, love of what you are doing. ~
long.author: Pele

long.text: By being yourself, you put something wonderful in the world that was not there before.
long.author: Edwin Elliot
